864670.name: Fantasy Grounds - A01 - Crypt of the Sun Lord (Savage Worlds)
864670.description:
A01 - Crypt of the Sun Lord

A Savage Worlds compatible adventure for Novice Ranked characters with 5-20 experience.
The adventurers travel across Serpent Lake with a group of Rybalkan soldiers. The group camps for the night adjacent to the ruins of KaTeek. As they sleep a goblin steals a precious keepsake from one of the PCs and disappears into the ruins. The party pursues and finds themselves confronting undead guardians of the Sun Lord while avoiding dangerous traps.
Will the PCs find the goblin and retrieve their precious keepsake or stumble upon something much more sinister?
Also included in Crypt of the Sun Lord:
  • The first adventure ever launched on the Adventureaweek website
  • Exclusive locations in the Adventureaweek Campaign Setting fleshed out in great detail and accompanied with high resolution maps.
  • Maps and Illustrations by 3x ENnie Award winning Cartographer Todd Gamble.
  • The Life Ring, a new magical item which bestows the wearer with extra Toughness.
  • A new minor artifact with hidden powers which unlock as the PCs increase in Rank.
by Jonathan G. Nelson
Cartography and illustrations by Todd Gamble
Interior art by Tim Tyler
Conversion by: Mark Sim
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Mark Sim
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
